entity_mention.mention_text: the man who saw him and did nothing
a grown man who could have intervened, and did not
exactly the kind of person who could and should have interceeded
a victim in all of this
a victim of nothing but his own cowardice and moral failings
a victim of both his rapist, and the man who saw him and did nothing
some low life sociopath or masochist
some low life sociopath or masochist
